DOC.brief_summary: A multi-center , randomize , double-blinded equivalence clinical trial evaluate efficacy safety LipiLou 20 mg versus Lipitor 20 mg hypercholesterolemic patient high risk cardiovascular disease Korea .
DOC.criteria: 1 . Dyslipidemic patient highrisk cardiovascular disease meeting 1 requirement ( LDLC ≥ 100mg/dL ) 1 ) Coronary artery disease diagnose atheroma Coronary CT Angiography , SPECT positive Treadmill test positive 2 ) Diabetes Mellitus 3 ) intervene stent coronary artery disease 1 year 4 ) diagnose atheroma carotid artery 5 ) Peripheral artery disease 2 . Aged 20~85 year 3 . Volunteers consent participate clinical trial submit consent paper 1 . Experimental examination screen 1 ) Active liver disease 2 x ULN AST/ALT 2 ) Creatine Kinase > 2 x ULN 3 ) Creatinine > 2.5mg/dL 4 ) Triglycerides > 500mg/dL 2. intervened stent coronary artery disease less 1 year 3 . Hypersensitive resistant HMGCoA reductase inhibitor , experience serious adverse event 4 . Patients take dyslipidemic treatment within 4 week ( HMGCoA reductase inhibitor , fibrates , nicotinic acid bile acid resin , etc . ) 5 . As uncontrolled DM patient , HbA1c≥11 % fast plasma glucose ≥200mg/dL 6 . DBP > 100mmHg , SBP > 160mmHg 7 . Diagnosed myopathy 8 . Appear risk myopathy renal impairment prior renal dysfunction hypothyroidism genetic defect family history myopathy experience prior muscle toxicity take statin fibrates prior liver disease high intake alcohol age 70 , risk myopathy 9 . Women pregnant breastfeed 10 . Women capable pregnancy without use contraceptive 11. contraindicate medically mentally , forbidden legally 12 . Enrolled clinical trial within 4 week 13 . Impossible participate clinical trial accord investigator 's decision
